title.rendered: Eldorado Fireplace Surrounds Crash DIY Network

content.rendered: An uninviting living room gets a much needed facelift with the help of Eldorado Fireplace Surrounds on the DIY Network’s hit show “House Crashers.” Tune in to the show on August 20th, 2012, at 8:30am eastern time.
